fields.name: loss
fields.title: Loss
fields.description: String (name of objective function), objective function or `tf.losses.Loss` instance

fields.name: metrics
fields.title: Metrics
fields.description: List of metrics to be evaluated by the model during trainin and testing

fields.name: loss_weights
fields.title: Loss Weights
fields.description: Optional list or dictionary specifying scalar coefficients (Python floats) to weight the loss contributions of different model outputs.

fields.name: weighted_metrics
fields.title: Weighted Metrics
fields.description: List of metrics to be evaluated and weighted by sample_weight or class_weight during training and testing.
